node.title: Jamaica has 4-man bobsled team in Olympics for first time since 1998
node.description: It's been 24 years since Jamaica had a four-man bobsled team in the Winter Games.
node.content: ["Jamaica will be back competing in the four-man bobsled at the\u00a0Winter Olympics\u00a0for the first time in nearly a quarter century.", "Team Jamaica\u00a0announced\u00a0Monday they have qualified for the event and two other bobsled events at the Beijing Games \u2013 the two-man bobsled and woman's monobob. It's the first time they've qualified for three bobsled events.\u00a0", "BREAKING:", "JAMAICA, WE HAVE A BOBSLED TEAM HEADING TO BEIJING! \ud83d\udce3", "It will be fire on ice as #TeamJamaica \ud83c\uddef\ud83c\uddf2 secured their spot at the 2022 Beijing #WinterOlympics. This will be the 1st time JAM has qualified in 3 Olympic bobsled events: four-man, two-man and women\u2019s monobob pic.twitter.com/hRd5h7lDlG", "While Jamaica has yet to announce who will be part of the four-man bobsled team, Shanwayne Stephens, a lance corporal in the Royal Air Force, is expected to be on it. After Jamaica's announcement, Stephens tweeted, \"We made it.\"\u00a0", "\"@Beijing2022\u00a0here we come. 24 years since we've had a 4man crew,\" he wrote Monday.\u00a0", "Training for the Beijing Olympics wasn't easy as the pandemic hit and lockdowns closed gyms in England, where some members of the bobsled team had to get creative in May 2020. Stephens told Reuters that they pushed a Mini Cooper down a road to \"replicate\" the pushing involved in their sport.\u00a0", "\"We've had people run over, thinking the car's broken down, trying to help us bump-start the car. When we tell them we're the Jamaica bobsleigh team, the direction is totally different, and they're very excited,\" he told the news outlet.\u00a0", "Jamaica first made its Winter Olympics debut with its famed four-man bobsled team in 1988 in Calgary, where they gained popularity as an underdog and for not finishing their race. Their historic run inspired the 1993 film, \"Cool Runnings.\" The 2022 Games mark the first Winter Olympics since the death of Sam Clayton Jr., a member of the team.\u00a0", "The last time Jamaica had a four-man sled team was at the 1998 Winter Olympics in Nagano, Japan. However, they've competed in the two-man bobsled team multiple times, including 1992, 1994, 1998, 2002 and 2014. Jamaica's two-woman bobsled made its first appearance in the 2018 Winter Games in Pyeongchang.\u00a0", "Team Jamaica also announced their first ever alpine skier who will represent them in Beijing. Benjamin Alexander, who is a former DJ, became the first Jamaica skier to qualify for the Winter Olympics in the giant shalom. \u00a0", "BREAKING: Benjamin Alexander \ud83c\uddef\ud83c\uddf2 made history by becoming the first Jamaican skier to qualify for the #WinterOlympics in giant slalom (alpine skiing) under the B criteria. #TeamJamaica #GuhHaadAndDone ", "(\ud83d\udcf8 Kristina Brik) pic.twitter.com/2gOrB3Yrhj", "Less than three weeks before the Winter Olympics are set to open,\u00a0China canceled plans on Monday to sell tickets to the public for the Games, as the number of\u00a0COVID-19\u00a0cases in the country reached its highest since March 2020. \u00a0", "Christopher Brito is a social media producer and trending writer for CBS News, focusing on sports and stories that involve issues of race and culture."]
